call_flow_context.purpose: Open-ended base layout for telco customer-service calls
call_flow_context.detailed_intent_description:
This is a generic call-flow “skeleton” used for open-ended analysis. It does not assume a specific customer intent (billing vs move vs cancellation vs troubleshooting). The goal is to produce a clean, high-level map of the conversation that is stable across many client use cases.

If the call is later treated as close-ended, this skeleton becomes pass 1/2: it provides a base layout that the second pass can refine into client-specific activities.
guidance: Use this as a lightweight skeleton when intent is open-ended or unknown.
Keep activities broad; do not overfit to a specific use case.
Prefer continuity: if uncertain, keep the prior activity rather than oscillating.
